pages.text: As the landing of this book states, the Encyclopedia is your go-to solution for finding information.$(br2)The Encyclopedia provides descriptions for various items you might find (only those from Immersive Weapons, and no I don't care about the 4th wall right now :D).

You might have noticed that many of the entries are $(#FF5555)locked$(). To unlock entries, complete advancements. As you complete advancements and unlock recipes, more entries in the Encyclopedia will appear.$(br2)Not everything is locked. General information and most resource entries are always unlocked.

Once entries are unlocked, your Encyclopedia will mark the new entries so you can easily find them.$(br2)While it's recommended that you always keep an Encyclopedia with you, you'll still unlock entries without it being present in your inventory. And if you use a different Encyclopedia, all of your entries will appear.
